Class TriviaGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TriviaGame

  • public class TriviaGame
extends java.lang.Object
    TriviaGame contains the trivia game for the application. It pulls random popular movies from TMDb and asks questions on it for the user to answer. The game keeps track of correct and incorrect answers.
    Version:
    First Release
    Author:
    Kimberlin Steffens, Raymundo Ramirez, Camaal Murray, Nicolas Heady

        public TriviaGame()
        The constructor for TrviviaGame. Instantiates all instance variables and sets the text to a welcome message.

    • Method Detail

      • quiz

        public final void quiz()
        Method to quiz the user. A random type of question is chosen and the question number is incremented.

      • quizGenre

        public final void quizGenre()
        Quizzes on the genre of a movie. First picks a random popular movie to quiz on and then asks the user.

      • quizActor

        public final void quizActor()
        Quizzes on the cast of a movie. First picks a random popular movie to quiz on and then asks the user.

      • quizTagline
